text: default, functions output 1-row data-frame, can useful CI/CD. also help avoid duplicating test code, help reader code focus one thing want test, instead burring thing much longer code need create fake object scratch. Since default parameters abstracted utils.R, makes easier maintain coordination values across variety datasets. fake_*() functions hide explicit content. reader code wants inspect data tested, need jump function definition call interactively.

title: Minimal fake factset_financial_data dataset that allow overwriting values — fake_factset_financial_data
code: fake_factset_financial_data() #> # A tibble: 1 × 7 #>   fsym_id  isin    factset_entity_id adj_price adj_shares_outstanding issue_type #>   <chr>    <chr>   <chr>                 <dbl>                  <dbl> <chr>      #> 1 A12345-B AB123C… 1234A5-B               12.3             1234567890 EQ         #> # ℹ 1 more variable: one_adr_eq <dbl>  fake_factset_financial_data(isin = "US0123456789") #> # A tibble: 1 × 7 #>   fsym_id  isin    factset_entity_id adj_price adj_shares_outstanding issue_type #>   <chr>    <chr>   <chr>                 <dbl>                  <dbl> <chr>      #> 1 A12345-B US0123… 1234A5-B               12.3             1234567890 EQ         #> # ℹ 1 more variable: one_adr_eq <dbl>
